doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Shamima Akhter

doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Shamima Akhter is a Skin & Sexual Diseases Specialist in Sylhet. Her qualification is MBBS, DDV, FCPS (Skin & Sex). She is a Professor & Head, Dermatology & Venereology at Jalalabad Ragib-Rabeya Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Trust Medical Services, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Shamima Akhter at Trust Medical Services, Sylhet is 6pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
